thread.title: Practo’s Shashank ND to address Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015; plus final agenda
thread.title_full: Practo’s Shashank ND to address Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015; plus final agenda

author: Team TC
title: Practo’s Shashank ND to address Techcircle SaaS Forum 2015; plus final agenda
text:
9:35am to 10:20am 
Insights I: Why is the time right to invest in SaaS businesses in India? 
Hear from leading entrepreneurs & investors on why this is the best time to invest your time, energy, money and resources in building SaaS businesses in India. Know from investor’s perspective on what’s driving them to bet on SaaS businesses in India? Know how big is the opportunity and what are the entrepreneurial opportunities for you to startup? 
Nitin Nayar, Managing Director, Warburg Pincus India Private Limited 
Salil Godika , Co-founder, Chief Strategy & Marketing Officer and Industry Group Head, Happiest Minds Technologies Pvt. Ltd. 
Avlesh Singh, Co-founder and CEO, WebEngage 
Mohan Kumar, Executive Director, Norwest Venture Partners 
Klaas Oskam, Managing Director, Signal Hill (Moderator) 
10:20am to 10:45am 
Keynote Address – How can SaaS transform the industry 
Shashank ND, Co-founder & CEO, Practo Technologies 
10:45am to 11:10am 
Keynote Address – Hits & Misses in Building Capillary 
Aneesh Reddy, Co-founder & CEO, Capillary Technologies 
11:10am to 11:30am 
11:30am to 12:15pm 
Insights II: Which markets to go for: Global v/s local, Enterprise v/s SMEs? 
While SaaS as a business model looks lucrative for companies of all sizes & scale and across geographies, one needs to have a laser sharp focus on which markets, segments and product fit would bring in the best results. Listen to leading SaaS experts on how to choose your product market fit, target markets and much more. 
Rob Arnold, Chairman, SLICeR Pte. Ltd 
Manav Garg, Founder & CEO, Eka Software Solutions 
Murli Ravi, Co-founder, Unicorn VC 
Saurabh Arora, Founder & CEO, Airwoot 
Parag Dhol, Managing Director, Inventus Advisors India (Moderator) 
12:15pm to 12:55pm 
Insights III: Growing opportunities in India centric SaaS Businesses: Are SME’s fostering SaaS transformation in India? 
With 6 million successful SMEs looking forward to embrace technology to help improve their day to day business activities such as accounting, payroll, benefit enrolment, expenses, reporting, are SaaS entrepreneurs focusing on this massive opportunity? If yes what’s the key behind cracking this unique opportunistic Do-it-for-me (DIM) SME & micro-business market? What does it take to help Indian, non tech savvy micro businesses adopt to simplified SaaS services? 
Ishwar Sridharan, Co-founder and COO, Exotel Techcom Pvt Ltd 
Ketan Kapoor, Co-founder & CEO, Mettl 
Manohar Chapalamadugu, Founder & CEO, Agile CRM 
Alok Goyal – Partner, Helion Advisors Pvt. Ltd (Moderator) 
12:55pm to 1:40pm 
1:40pm to 2:25pm 
Insights IV: Early SaaS adopters’ v/s Back Benchers – Emerging sectors embracing SaaS services 
SaaS wave touched across the business landscape in India demonstrating advantages of embracing plug-and-play delivery model with few sectors embracing the SaaS models in early days. Which are emerging sectors now willing to embrace SaaS and fuelling the next level of growth? With the emergence of an allied sector enabling large ecommerce businesses besides demand from traditional sectors such as retail, financial services, healthcare amongst others, which other sectors are likely to gain momentum? With SaaS opportunity evident in sectors adopting SaaS models now & early adopters of SaaS services, will Indian companies grab the larger pie of this market or will large international players will lead the show? 
Ambarish Gupta, CEO & Founder, Knowlarity Communications Pvt Ltd 
Mridhul Prakash, Co-founder and CEO, BluSynergy 
Vijay Sharma, Co-founder & CEO, Belong.co 
& CEO, SmartRx 
& MD, Blume Venture Advisors Pvt. Ltd.(Moderator) 
– Essentials for building a world -class SaaS company – Product, Usability, Talent & pricing: The act of mastering it right 
& CEO, RateGain 
& challenges facing SaaS Entrepreneurs. 
& Co-founder, Frictionless Ventures 
& Networking Break 
& personalization of SaaS services? 
& enabling consumers to get things done smartly, are SaaS service providers moving towards consumerization & personalization of SaaS services? 
& CMO, QwikCilver Solutions Pvt. Ltd 
& CEO, Mad Street Den 
– Powered by Nasscom 10,000 Startups 
tions on their path-breaking ideas, business models and niche opportunities. 
#TCSaaS15
